act: Statute Law Revision (Isle of Man) Act 1991
section_text: 1 1 The enactments which were repealed (whether for the whole or any part of the United Kingdom) by the Acts specified in Schedule 1 to this Act are hereby repealed so far as they extend to the Isle of Man. 2 The Acts specified in Schedule 2 to this Act are hereby repealed so far as they extend to the Isle of Man.

act: Statute Law Revision (Isle of Man) Act 1991
section_text: 2 1 This Act may be cited as the Statute Law Revision (Isle of Man) Act 1991. 2 This Act extends only to the Isle of Man.
